verses.verse: I love <WH157> the LORD <WH3068>, because he hath heard <WH8085> my voice <WH6963> and my supplications <WH8469>.
Because he hath inclined <WH5186> his ear <WH241> unto me, therefore will I call <WH7121> upon him as long as I live <WH3117>.
The sorrows <WH2256> of death <WH4194> compassed <WH661> me, and the pains <WH4712> of hell <WH7585> gat hold <WH4672> upon me: I found <WH4672> trouble <WH6869> and sorrow <WH3015>.
Then called <WH7121> I upon the name <WH8034> of the LORD <WH3068>; O LORD <WH3068>, I beseech <WH577> thee, deliver <WH4422> my soul <WH5315>.
Gracious <WH2587> is the LORD <WH3068>, and righteous <WH6662>; yea, our God <WH430> is merciful <WH7355>.
The LORD <WH3068> preserveth <WH8104> the simple <WH6612>: I was brought low <WH1809>, and he helped <WH3467> me.
Return <WH7725> unto thy rest <WH4494>, O my soul <WH5315>; for the LORD <WH3068> hath dealt bountifully <WH1580> with thee.
For thou hast delivered <WH2502> my soul <WH5315> from death <WH4194>, mine eyes <WH5869> from tears <WH1832>, and my feet <WH7272> from falling <WH1762>.
I will walk <WH1980> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> in the land <WH776> of the living <WH2416>.
I believed <WH539>, therefore have I spoken <WH1696>: I was greatly <WH3966> afflicted <WH6031>:
I said <WH559> in my haste <WH2648>, All men <WH120> are liars <WH3576>.
What shall I render <WH7725> unto the LORD <WH3068> for all his benefits <WH8408> toward me?
I will take <WH5375> the cup <WH3563> of salvation <WH3444>, and call <WH7121> upon the name <WH8034> of the LORD <WH3068>.
I will pay <WH7999> my vows <WH5088> unto the LORD <WH3068> now in the presence of all his people <WH5971>.
Precious <WH3368> in the sight <WH5869> of the LORD <WH3068> is the death <WH4194> of his saints <WH2623>.
O LORD <WH3068>, truly <WH577> I am thy servant <WH5650>; I am thy servant <WH5650>, and the son <WH1121> of thine handmaid <WH519>: thou hast loosed <WH6605> my bonds <WH4147>.
I will offer <WH2076> to thee the sacrifice <WH2077> of thanksgiving <WH8426>, and will call <WH7121> upon the name <WH8034> of the LORD <WH3068>.
I will pay <WH7999> my vows <WH5088> unto the LORD <WH3068> now in the presence of all his people <WH5971>,
In the courts <WH2691> of the LORD's <WH3068> house <WH1004>, in the midst <WH8432> of thee, O Jerusalem <WH3389>. Praise <WH1984> ye the LORD <WH3050>.
